description:
Aaron came in with his best friend Jacob, which aired last week.
Aaron played football, and has High School Jock kind of written all over him. On one hand he seems more mature than Jacob, but in other ways he seems to be lagging behind a bit. I can't put my finger on it, but I think the fact that Aaron rarely uses email makes me think he isn't as tech savvy as his best friend.
More into working with hands and body.
I sense a bit of bromance going on, but I am certain its platonic. Its just so easy to read "more" into it when guys have been friends for so long, and have banged girls at the same time.
Like Jacob, he was a little quiet during his shoot, and I wonder if neither one of them really let go cuz they were worried their friend would hear them.
I would love to get either of them back for an oral, but as of writing this, they both are kind of thinking about it, but they don't want the other one to know.
So who knows. I told them they should just come in and blow each other, and that didn't seem to freak them out.
But still, I think they are worried about what the other friend will think, so we are at a standstill.
As for Aaron, his cumshot was what I had planned. After doing so many shoots, sometimes you get good at guessing where and how the cum is gonna come out. I knew right away to have a camera front and center to catch all his load drip down the front of his magnificent cock!
title: Aaron - Solo
